info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 6:54PM EDT until June 26 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Rutherford County in western North Carolina... Central Polk County in western North Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 653 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Columbus, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Forest City, Rutherfordton, Spindale, Ellenboro, Bostic, Cliffside, Green Hill, Mill Spring, Henrietta and Harris. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
